title: NTRUHS: Courses, Fees, Admission 2024, Cutoff, Placements
meta_description: NTRUHS is a state university in Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh and was established in 1986. YSRUHS has more than 180 affiliated colleges that offer UG, PG, Doctoral, Super Speciality and PhD courses.
keywords: NTRUHS, NTRUHS Admissions, NTRUHS Results, NTRUHS Placements, NTRUHS Courses, NTRUHS Facilities

basic_info.name: NTRUHS Highlights
description: Some of the important highlights of NTRUHS are mentioned below:

basic_info.name: NTRUHS Courses & Fees
description: NTRUHS offers various UG, PG and Doctoral courses in various categories based on the merit in their respective entrance examinations. Detailed information about the NTRUHS Courses and Fees are mentioned below:

basic_info.name: NTRUHS Admission 2024
description: NTRUHS Admissions to various UG and PG programs are done based on marks secured by the candidates in their qualifying examination. Candidates must pass the entrance exams for courses such as MBBS, BDS, BPT, MD, MDS, MPT, DM and M.Ch, which is followed by counselling. The university also offers admission into Management Quota seats for BHMS and BAMS for eligible candidates.

YSRUHS offers reservations for economically weaker sections and minority communities. The reservation is as follows:

basic_info.name: NTRUHS Cutoff 2024
description: NTRUHS Cutoff for MBBS will be released soon after the NEET UG results are published. NTRUHS offers seats to MBBS courses at its affiliated colleges based on their NEET UG score. The university reserves 85% of seats under the Andhra Pradesh State quota and 15% under the All India Quota.
Here is the round-wise NEET UG cutoff 2024(expected) at various NTRUHS Affiliated Colleges for the candidates belonging to unreserved categories.

basic_info.name: NTRUHS Results 2024
description: NTRUHS Results are published for semester examinations for various courses on the official website. The results for the courses and their specializations can be easily accessed by visiting the official website of the university. Candidates who are not satisfied with their results and failed the examination can register for the re-evaluation process.

basic_info.name: NTRUHS Placements
description: NTRUHS provides students with placement and internship opportunities. The compulsory internship for one year provides a stipend and also helps enhance their skills. The University also offers training and career guidance services to help students develop their personalities and design their careers.

basic_info.name: NTRUHS Facilities
description: Following are the facilities offered by Dr YSR University of Health Sciences to cater to the needs of the students:

faqs.question: How is Dr YSR University of Health Sciences?
faqs.answer: Ans.It is one of the most efficient universities in India for science students. NTRUHS is the affiliating body for many prestigious colleges like Osmania Medical College, Gandhi Medical College, and Kakatiya Medical College. It offers a platform for everyone to learn and grow in a supportive environment. The alumni network of the university is also very approachable. They frequently visit the college and have interactive sessions with the students and faculties.

faqs.question: How is the campus life at Dr YSR University of Health Sciences?
faqs.answer: Ans.The university regularly organizes extracurricular activities on its campus for students. Some of them are the Swachh Bharat Mission, Environment Day, and Cricket Tournament with a large number of students participating in them. The university is equipped with all the necessary facilities such as a well-stocked library, labs, classrooms, etc for the students.

faqs.question: Does the University offer any financial help to the students?
faqs.answer: Ans.There are a number of scholarships available for deserving and meritorious students, especially those belonging to SC/ST and Backward Classes. The state government offers financial help to such students. To apply for the same, students must contact the university.

faqs.question: Is NTRUHS renamed?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, Dr NTR University of Health Sciences was renamed as Dr YSR University of Health Sciences.

faqs.question: What is the qualifying exam for M.Sc Nursing?
faqs.answer: Ans.There is no qualifying exam for M.Sc Nursing. Candidates with a B.Sc in nursing are eligible for admission.

faqs.question: What is AIAPGET?
faqs.answer: Ans.AIAPGET is an entrance exam for AYUSH courses such as BAMS, BHMS and BUMS.

faqs.question: What is the duration of PhD degree at YSRUHS?
faqs.answer: Ans.YSRUHS offers both full-time and part-time PhD degrees and the duration of the course is 3-5 years.

faqs.question: What are the selection criteria for super speciality courses?
faqs.answer: Ans.Candidates must have a Master’s degree in the relevant field and must appear in the NEET-SS entrance exam.

faqs.question: How many colleges are affiliated with YSRUHS?
faqs.answer: Ans.There is a total of 356 colleges both private and government in Andhra Pradesh affiliated to YSRUHS.

faqs.question: Is the UGSRS Scholarship provided for PG students as well?
faqs.answer: Ans.No,Under Graduate Student Research Scholarships (UGSRS) are only offered to UG students pursuing  MBBS, BDS, AYUSH, Nursing, and Physiotherapy of the affiliated colleges.

faqs.question: What facilities are provided at YSRUHS?
faqs.answer: Ans.YSRUHS provides students with a library, labs, gym, IT infrastructure, and sports for the overall development of students.

faqs.question: What are the UG courses offered by YSRUHS Vijayawada?
faqs.answer: Ans.YSRUHS, Vijayawada offers UG courses in MBBS, BDS, BAMS, BHMS, BNYS, BUMS, B.Sc and BPT.

faqs.question: Ques. What is the admission process for the M.D.S programme at NTRUHS Vijayawada?
faqs.answer: Ans.Admission to the M.D.S programme is done based on marks obtained by the candidate in the entrance exam- NEET MDS.

faqs.question: What is the fee structure for BPT at NTRUHS?
faqs.answer: Ans.The fee structure for BPT is INR 5,000 per year.

Section.name: About NTRUHS
Section.description:
Dr. NTR University of Health Sciences (NTRUHS) is a state university in Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh. NTRUHS was established in 1986 and is named for Dr Nandamuri Taraka Rama Rao, a former chief minister of the state of Andhra Pradesh. The Government of Andhra Pradesh renamed Dr NTR University of Health Sciences as “Dr YSR University of Health Sciences”. This state university has received recognition from several statutory authorities, including the Indian Nursing Council (INC), Central Council of Homeopathy (CCH), Central Council of Indian Medicine (CCIM), and Medical Council of India (MCI).
Notable Alumni of NTRUHS
Check More: NTRUHS Scholarship


NTRUHS Campus Tour
Some of the important highlights of NTRUHS are mentioned below:
NTRUHS offers various UG, PG and Doctoral courses in various categories based on the merit in their respective entrance examinations. Detailed information about the NTRUHS Courses and Fees are mentioned below:
NTRUHS Admissions to various UG and PG programs are done based on marks secured by the candidates in their qualifying examination. Candidates must pass the entrance exams for courses such as MBBS, BDS, BPT, MD, MDS, MPT, DM and M.Ch, which is followed by counselling. The university also offers admission into Management Quota seats for BHMS and BAMS for eligible candidates.
Candidates can apply for NTRUHS Admission by following the below-mentioned steps:

NTRUHS Cutoff for MBBS will be released soon after the NEET UG results are published. NTRUHS offers seats to MBBS courses at its affiliated colleges based on their NEET UG score. The university reserves 85% of seats under the Andhra Pradesh State quota and 15% under the All India Quota.
Here is the round-wise NEET UG cutoff 2024(expected) at various NTRUHS Affiliated Colleges for the candidates belonging to unreserved categories.
NTRUHS Results are published for semester examinations for various courses on the official website. Candidates who are not satisfied with their results and failed the examination can register for the re-evaluation process.

Ques. How is Dr YSR University of Health Sciences?
Ans. It is one of the most efficient universities in India for science students. NTRUHS is the affiliating body for many prestigious colleges like Osmania Medical College, Gandhi Medical College, and Kakatiya Medical College. It offers a platform for everyone to learn and grow in a supportive environment. The alumni network of the university is also very approachable. They frequently visit the college and have interactive sessions with the students and faculties.
Ques. How is the campus life at Dr YSR University of Health Sciences?
Ans. The university regularly organizes extracurricular activities on its campus for students. Some of them are the Swachh Bharat Mission, Environment Day, and Cricket Tournament with a large number of students participating in them. The university is equipped with all the necessary facilities such as a well-stocked library, labs, classrooms, etc for the students.
Ques. Does the University offer any financial help to the students?
Ans. There are a number of scholarships available for deserving and meritorious students, especially those belonging to SC/ST and Backward Classes. The state government offers financial help to such students. To apply for the same, students must contact the university.
Ques. Is NTRUHS renamed?
Ans. Yes, Dr NTR University of Health Sciences was renamed as Dr YSR University of Health Sciences.
Ques. What is the qualifying exam for M.Sc Nursing?
Ans. There is no qualifying exam for M.Sc Nursing. Candidates with a B.Sc in nursing are eligible for admission.
Ques. What is AIAPGET?
Ans. AIAPGET is an entrance exam for AYUSH courses such as BAMS, BHMS and BUMS.
Ques. What is the duration of PhD degree at YSRUHS?
Ans. YSRUHS offers both full-time and part-time PhD degrees and the duration of the course is 3-5 years.
Ques. What are the selection criteria for super speciality courses?
Ans. Candidates must have a Master’s degree in the relevant field and must appear in the NEET-SS entrance exam.
Ques. How many colleges are affiliated with YSRUHS?
Ans. There is a total of 356 colleges both private and government in Andhra Pradesh affiliated to YSRUHS.
Ques. Is the UGSRS Scholarship provided for PG students as well?
Ans. No, Under Graduate Student Research Scholarships (UGSRS) are only offered to UG students pursuing MBBS, BDS, AYUSH, Nursing, and Physiotherapy of the affiliated colleges.
Ques. What facilities are provided at YSRUHS?
Ans. YSRUHS provides students with a library, labs, gym, IT infrastructure, and sports for the overall development of students.
Ques. What are the UG courses offered by YSRUHS Vijayawada?
Ans. YSRUHS, Vijayawada offers UG courses in MBBS, BDS, BAMS, BHMS, BNYS, BUMS, B.Sc and BPT.
Ques. What is the admission process for the M.D.S programme at NTRUHS Vijayawada?
Ans. Admission to the M.D.S programme is done based on marks obtained by the candidate in the entrance exam- NEET MDS.
Ques. What is the fee structure for BPT at NTRUHS?
Ans. The fee structure for BPT is INR 5,000 per year.
